title: Amirthaa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Take-out, Sri Lankan
description: Vegetarian restaurant serveing typical South Indian food such as dosas, idly, parota, thali, with vegan options. Uses ghee, so vegans please inquire. Directions: arrive Bambalapitiya station by train, you should go up by Station Rd, turn right on Galle Rd. Located close to a Tamil Hindu temple. One other location is near old Kadiresan Temple.
